name: MobbAutofixer-preview
helpMarkDown: Consumes SAST report to generate autofixes. For more information, see the documentation: https://docs.mobb.ai/mobb-user-docs/ci-cd-integrations/azure-devops
author: Antony

inputs.name: MobbConnection
inputs.label: Credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Credentials

Select the credentials to use for running an analysis. Add credentials using Mobb Connection Service Service. How do I get my credentials?

inputs.name: SASTReportFileLocation
inputs.label: SAST Report File Location
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Scan Name

An optional name for the scan. This name is used to differentiate results on the Build page.

inputs.name: MobbProjectName
inputs.label: Mobb Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the Mobb Project Name

If this is not specified, the default project "My first Project" will be used.

inputs.name: RepositoryURI
inputs.label: Repository URL
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the Repository URL

If this is not specified, the value from BUILD_REPOSITORY_URI environment variable will be used.

inputs.name: BranchName
inputs.label: Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the Branch Name

If this is not specified, the value from SYSTEM_PULLREQUEST_SOURCEBRANCH (priority), or BUILD_SOURCEBRANCHNAME will be used.

inputs.name: repoFolderLocation
inputs.label: Repo Sub Folder Location
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the Repository folder location

If this is not specified, the current working directory SYSTEM_DEFAULTWORKINGDIRECTORY will be used.

inputs.name: autopr
inputs.label: Automatic PR
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify whether Automatic Pull Request is enabled.

Click here to learn more.

inputs.name: commitdirectly
inputs.label: Commit Directly
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify whether bugsy will commit directly to the target branch when Automatic PR is enabled (Requires Automatic PR to be enabled).

Click here to learn more.
